534340.name: FourChords Guitar Karaoke - 80's Pop Song Pack
534340.description:
Step into a time machine and transport yourself to the cool 80’s with awesome free FourChords Song Pack. Songs included in this update:

  • Cutting Crew ­- (I Just) Died in Your Arms
  • Michael Jackson ­- Billie Jean
  • Simple Minds ­- Don’t You (Forget About Me)
  • Cyndi Lauper ­- Girls Just Wanna Have Fun
  • Madonna ­- Holiday
  • Suzanne Vega -­ Luka
  • Richard Marx ­- Right Here Waiting
  • Don Henley -­ The Boys of Summer
  • Pat Benatar ­- We Belong
  • Black ­- Wonderful Life
534340.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
